0.3.5.name: wordpress/blogorola-wordpress-plugin
0.3.5.description:
goodies for blogorola - ultimate blogroll.

  • comment synchronization

all comments are synchronized between blogorola and your blog. so any comments posted on your blog will be displayed on blogorola and vice-versa. this enables much easier discussions between readers (members of the blogorola community). comments received from blogorola will be marked with a small icon before author's name.

  • hot'or'not

this will display a hot'or'not voting toolbar in your post detail. hot'or'not is blogorola's rating system, which readers can use to rate your posts. posts with good ratings are read more often and are featured on blogorola's website.

  • update services

our update service enables your wordpress blog to automatically notify blogorola of a new post as soon as you publish it. this way it will appear on
